original_text:
Dragons Temple
Dai creatori di giochi Spielo, Dragons Temple è uno slot a 50 linee di pagamento che ha un tema cinese distinto. Se il titolo della slot non l’ha dato via, ci si può aspettare di vedere simboli cinesi come draghi, carpe koi e il cerchio yin e yang, che fa parte delle caratteristiche divertenti della slot. Girando le bobine si ha la possibilità di atterrare una bobina piena e in espansione o uno scatter che fa scattare fino a tre opzioni di rotazioni libere. I giocatori apprezzeranno la semplice configurazione, ma potranno comunque godere dell’eccellente grafica e delle grandi caratteristiche che offre.
Una grafica orientaleggiante
Lo slot ha un aspetto decisamente cinese, con diversi dettagli che rendono omaggio al paese. Tutte le scritte incluse sui rulli, dal titolo dello slot ai simboli delle carte da gioco, sono state reinterpretate in cinese, in quanto sono presentate con un carattere molto simile ai caratteri hanzi cinesi che si trovano nella scrittura. I simboli sono anche elementi comuni che si associano alla Cina, tra cui le carpe koi e le lanterne.
Mentre i rulli girano, si sentono i suoni associati alla musica tradizionale cinese, che comprende strumenti a corda, flauti e tamburi. Aiuta a rendere la fessura più autentica, con i suoni che aumentano di intensità solo quando si attiva una vittoria o una funzione.
Posizionata contro un’area boscosa arancione e rossa, questa slot si sente immediatamente calma, cosa insolita da dire quando la parola drago è inclusa nel titolo. Mentre la fessura si carica, si vede che la foschia rosso-arancio è causata dal tramonto del sole in lontananza, che fa sì che le montagne e il tempio che lo sovrasta diventino dello stesso colore.
Funzioni e simboli della Slot Machine
Proprio in fondo alla pagina, vedrete i simboli delle carte da gioco colorate, che fungono da simboli di pagamento più basso sui rulli. Ognuna paga un importo diverso, con 10, il più basso pagante, dando 15.000 per x3, 30.000 per x4 e 90.000 per x5. Il pagante più alto, l’A, paga 30.000, 75.000 e 600.0000 per tre, quattro e cinque.
Il vaso ornamentale blu è il primo dei simboli di pagamento più significativi che troverete. Questi pagano anche quando ne atterrate solo due sulle bobine, invece di tre, quattro e cinque. Il vaso paga una cifra massima di 750.000, mentre la carpa aumenterà il vostro saldo di 900.000 quando ne troverete cinque sui rotoli. Le lanterne sono le successive sulla bilancia dei pagamenti, con una paga massima di 1.200.000, mentre il tempio ve ne dà 1.500.000.
Anche i molti draghi colorati pagano bene, così come il logo del Tempio dei Draghi, con entrambi questi simboli che danno 15.000 per x2, 150.000 per x3, 600.000 per x4 e 3.000.000.000 per x5 dello stesso. Si tratta di un’incredibile somma di denaro, che rende questo slot l’opzione perfetta per i rulli alti.
Ci sono due caratteristiche principali quando si gioca a Dragons Temple. La prima riguarda i simboli dei draghi. Questi cinque draghi, ognuno con la propria bobina, sono simboli Wild, il che significa che possono sostituire tutti gli altri simboli sulle bobine tranne lo Scatter. I draghi Wild sono anche molto di più di quello che si vede per la prima volta. Quando un drago fa parte di una combinazione vincente, si espanderà fino a coprire l’intera bobina, scatenando potenzialmente un enorme payout.
La seconda caratteristica riguarda il simbolo Yin Yang, che è anche lo Scatter. Oltre a un gustoso pagamento per due e tre simboli corrispondenti, trovarne tre è anche la chiave per il bonus di rotazioni gratuite. Una volta che la selezione dei giri gratuiti è stata attivata, i giocatori dovranno scegliere una delle tre opzioni.
Altre Slot Machine simili
Se hai apprezzato il tema di questa Slot Machine di Spielo, possiamo suggerirti di scommettere i tuoi soldi su Triple Dragons, la Slot Machine prodotta da Pragmatic Play. Oltre ad una grafica molto interessante potrai goderti l’incredibile RTP del 96,51%!

raw_translation.response:
Dragons Temple 
Straight from the gaming minds at Spielo, Dragons Temple is a 50 payline slot with a distinct Chinese theme. As the title suggests, players can expect to see Chinese symbols like dragons, koi carp and the yin and yang circle, all adding to the slot's fun features. You'll have the chance to land a full-expanding reel or a scatter that triggers up to three free spin options. Players will appreciate the uncomplicated setup, but still enjoy the excellent graphics and great features on offer. 

Oriental Graphics 
The slot has a decidedly Chinese look, with various details paying tribute to the country. All the text, from the slot title to the playing card symbols, have been reinterpreted in Chinese, presented in a font that's very similar to the hanzi Chinese characters in writing. The symbols are also common elements associated with China, such as koi carp and lanterns. 

As the reels spin, you can hear the sounds of traditional Chinese music, including stringed instruments, flutes, and drums. It helps to make the slot more authentic, with the sounds that increase in intensity only when a win or feature is activated.

Slot Machine Functions and Symbols 
At the bottom of the page, you'll see the colourful playing card symbols which act as the lower paying symbols on the reels. Each pays a different amount, with 10 being the lowest paying, giving 15,000 for x3, 30,000 for x4 and 90,000 for x5. The highest paying, the A, pays 30,000, 75,000 and 600,0000 for three, four, and five. 

The blue leafy vase is the first of the more significant paying symbols you will come across. These also pay when you land only two on the reels instead of three, four, and five. The vase pays up to a maximum of 750,000, while the koi carp will increase your balance by 900,000 when you land five on the reels. The lanterns are next on the payment scale, with a maximum payout of 1,200,000, while the temple will give you 1,500,000. 

Even the many colourful dragons pay well, as does the Dragon's Temple logo, with both symbols giving 15,000 for x2, 150,000 for x3, 600,000 for x4, and a whopping 3,000,000. This is an incredible amount of money, making this slot the perfect option for high rollers. 

There are two main features when playing Dragons Temple. The first concerns the dragon symbols. These five dragons, each with their own reel, are Wild symbols, meaning they can replace all other symbols on the reels except for the Scatter. The Wild dragons are also much more than what you see at first. When a dragon is part of a winning combination, it will expand to cover the entire reel, potentially triggering a huge payout. 

The second feature concerns the Yin Yang symbol, which is also the Scatter. In addition to a tasty payout for two and three matching symbols, landing three is also the key to the free spins bonus. Once the free spins selection has been activated, players will need to choose one of three options. 

Similar Slot Machines 
If you enjoyed the theme of this Spielo Slot Machine, we can suggest betting your money on Triple Dragons, the Slot Machine produced by Pragmatic Play. In addition to a very interesting graphic, you can also enjoy the incredible RTP of 96.51%!

response.content:
If you love Chinese artwork, then Dragon's Temple is definitely the slot machine for you. The graphics are so picturesque and detailed you'll feel like you're wandering through an exotic museum. If you're not an art connoisseur, it's still worth checking out-the game is beautifully animated.

response.headline: Examining the Game Symbols and Paylines in Dragon's Temple
response.content:
Let's talk about the symbols in the game, shall we? The boring stuff first - the lower-paying symbols, which are the colorful playing-card symbols. But we're really here for the higher-paying symbols. And boy, are they a sight for sore eyes. We have the blue ornamental vase, koi carp, lanterns, and the temple - all gorgeously designed and intricately detailed.

And let's not forget about the dragons - this is Dragon's Temple after all! The dragons themselves come in a variety of colors, each more stunning than the last. Even the Dragon's Temple logo sparks joy, and pay-outs!

But the real star of the show here is the Wild symbol - the Dragon. Not only is it powerful, majestic, and awe-inspiring, but it also has the potential to trigger some massive pay-outs. It expands to cover the entire reel, and if that happens in combination with other symbols, watch out - you might be in for a real treat.

Another important symbol in the game is the Yin Yang - the Scatter symbol. This is key to unlocking the coveted free spin bonus. Once you're ready to enter the bonus round, you'll be presented with a choice - and we all know that the road to riches is paved with choices, right?

Overall, the game symbols in Dragon's Temple are superb, engaging, and really make the game come to life. It's clear that the designers put some serious thought and effort into making everything look gorgeous and visually appealing - and it paid off.

As the reels spin, you can hear the sounds associated with traditional Chinese music, which includes stringed instruments, flutes, and drums. This helps make the slot more authentic, with the sounds intensifying only when you activate a win or a feature.

Functions and Symbols of the Slot Machine 
At the bottom of the page, you will see the colorful playing card symbols, which serve as the lower-paying symbols on the reels. Each pays a different amount, with 10, the lowest-paying symbol, giving 15,000 for x3, 30,000 for x4, and 90,000 for x5. The highest-paying symbol, the A, pays 30,000, 75,000, and 600,000 for three, four, and five.

The blue ornamental vase is the first of the more significant paying symbols you will find. These also pay when you land only two on the reels, instead of three, four, and five. The vase pays a maximum amount of 750,000, while the carp will increase your balance by 900,000 when you find five on the reels. Lanterns are next on the payout scale, with a maximum payout of 1,200,000, while the temple will give you 1,500,000.

Even the many colorful dragons pay well, as does the Dragon's Temple logo, with both symbols giving 15,000 for x2, 150,000 for x3, 600,000 for x4, and 3,000,000,000 for x5 of the same. This is an incredible amount of money, making this slot the perfect choice for high rollers.

There are two main features when playing Dragon's Temple. The first concerns the dragon symbols. These five dragons, each with its reel, are Wild symbols, meaning they can replace all other symbols on the reels except the Scatter. The Wild dragons are also much more than what meets the eye at first glance. When a dragon is part of a winning combination, it will expand to cover the entire reel, potentially triggering a huge payout.

The second feature concerns the Yin Yang symbol, which is also the Scatter. In addition to a tasty payout for two and three matching symbols, finding three is also the key to the free spin bonus. Once the free spin selection has been activated, players will need to choose one of the three options.
